author: eyang
msg: Updated dates happened in Chukwa project.

author: veithen
msg: Moved some of the iterator implementations from axiom-api to axiom-common-impl, while keeping deprecated copies in axiom-api.

Rationale: Normally these classes are not considered part of the public API (application code is supposed to use the corresponding methods in OMContainer/OMElement). Having them in axiom-common-impl means that we can freely refactor them without the risk of breaking existing code. The deprecated classes will be removed in Axiom 1.3.

author: jleroux
msg: Closes "The time part (cursors) of the Date Time picker is not internationalized" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4015
* Updating datetimepicker from 0.9.3 to 0.9.6 (where a localization folder exists)

* Use the fantastic createJsLanguageFileMapping service Sascha introduced (I just removed the confusing wrong comment about JsLanguageFilesMapping.ftl being generated and added a block for datetimepicker, also in JsLanguageFileMappingCreator.java). A very good dynamic+static tool, kudos Sascha!
Should work also in eCommerce though I did not found any uses
